data.text: This is another message that I received from Yahweh.
I will also punish the people in nearby Hamath city.
The people in Tyre built a high wall around their city.
But I, Yahweh, will cause their precious possessions to be taken away
The people in Ashkelon city will see that happen,
I will no longer allow them to eat [MTY] meat that still has blood in it,
Rejoice very much, you people of Jerusalem [APO, DOU]
I will get rid of the chariots in the Ephraim region that are used in battles
As for you my people of Jerusalem,
You people who were prisoners in those countries who still confidently expect God to help you,
I will cause Judah to be like [MET] my bow,
Some day Yahweh will appear in the sky above his people,
The Commander of the armies of angels will protect his people;
On that day, Yahweh our God will save his people
They will be delightful and beautiful.
